SEARCH
Package marksmgmtcode

Class StudentManager

java.lang.Object
marksmgmtcode.StudentManager
public class StudentManager extends Object
Manages the student records for the Marks Management application. This class handles operations such as adding, updating, and deleting student records.

  • Constructor Details

    • StudentManager

      public StudentManager()
      Constructor for StudentManager. Initializes a list to hold student records.

  • Method Details

    • addStudent

      public void addStudent(Student student)
      Adds a student to the student list. Checks for duplicate entries based on student ID before adding.
      Parameters:
      student - The student object to be added.

    • findStudent

      public Student findStudent(String studentId)
      Finds a student in the list by their student ID.
      Parameters:
      studentId - The ID of the student to find.
      Returns:
      The found Student object or null if not found.

    • updateStudent

      public void updateStudent(String studentId, String newStudentName)
      Updates the name of a student.
      Parameters:
      studentId - The ID of the student whose name is to be updated.
      newStudentName - The new name of the student.

    • deleteStudent

      public void deleteStudent(String studentId)
      Deletes a student from the list based on student ID.
      Parameters:
      studentId - The ID of the student to be deleted.

    • updateStudentMarks

      public void updateStudentMarks(String studentId, double pfMarks, double dbmsMarks)
      Updates Marks for student based on student ID.
      Parameters:
      studentId - The ID of the student for marks to be updated.
      pfMarks - Marks to be updated for Programming Fundamentals for the student.
      dbmsMarks - Marks to be updated for DBMS for the student.
